department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Inspection and maintenance of garage doors at Public Works and Government Services Canada - Quebec Base
description: Garage door inspection and maintenance services required. The services are to oversee five (5) annual inspection visits and ten (10) semi-annual inspection visits. Summitt-t Service may be carried out over fourteen (14) quarterly term as needed. Work will be performed during regular working hours, Department should note that the Department does not provide the entire list of garage doors for evalutation however the total sum of the cost of the service would amount to 12 (twelve per year) works or  $13,500 CAD.
